column9: The reviews are ineffective; since, they are not organized acording to category; i.e., area of body affected. Few respondents in the area of anti-fungal/groan. Have administered the topical creme medicine which seens counter-intuitive. Fungus prefer moist environs. Seemed to do better with Tolfanate dry powder which alleviated the itch, but slight smell persists. Clotrimazole isn't killing it 100%, beause the smell linguors.
